name: Aeva Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: to make the most of this hotel you need a sea view .
reviews.title: location , view , cleanliness ....

reviews.text: the clean room we had was on the small side but the view and small balcony made up for it , the bathroom was a very good size for a french hotel .
reviews.title: Excellent!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we didn't eat here as there are many many places to eat close by so the choice is yours.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel to stay in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the main thing against was the poor quality of the furniture and fittings considering this hotel had a refit quite recently .
reviews.title: What a view!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel was very clean and in a great location. The staff was professional and went out of there way to make sure we enjoyed our stay!!! Loved the live music and great food and drinks. Easy to find and access to stores and the autostrada. Thank you again for the great hospitality.
reviews.title: A Very Good Hotel

description: Located in the heart of the Baie des Anges overlooking the Mediterranean sea, the Domain Hotelier Aeva welcomes you in the middle of its garden setting filled with flowers and scents in one of these 3 properties with direct views of the sea, close to Nice Airport and the racetrack of Cagnes sur Mer:-Aeva Hotel:on the traces of art deco architecture of the French Riviera with its magnificent facade with red Tuscan Italian accents. -Appart'é hotel, luxury residential hotel at 20 meters from the beach by his astonishing architecture of the 30s with its balconies extraordinary wave-shaped.-A&E Restaurant facing the sea welcomes you for a drink at the lounge bar for dinner on the panoramic terrace or garden landscape.
